chrome.notes: Starting with Chrome 53 and Opera 40, untrusted events do not invoke the default action.

chrome_android.notes: Starting with Chrome 53 and Opera 40, untrusted events do not invoke the default action.

ie.notes: In Internet Explorer, all events are trusted except those that are created with the createEvent() method.

nodejs.notes: This is not used in Node.js and is provided purely for completeness.

opera.notes: Starting with Chrome 53 and Opera 40, untrusted events do not invoke the default action.

opera_android.notes: Starting with Chrome 53 and Opera 40, untrusted events do not invoke the default action.

samsunginternet_android.notes: Starting with Samsung Internet 6.0 and Opera 40, untrusted events do not invoke the default action.

webview_android.notes: Starting with version 53, untrusted events do not invoke the default action.
